name: Kai Sato
description: A slim man in his late twenties with close-cropped dark hair and a calm demeanor. Kai projects an ever-changing series of holographic tattoos over his skin - swirling geometric patterns one moment, intricate floral designs the next. His eyes are kind but observant, always scanning for signs of trouble.

personality.voice: soft-spoken and soothing, with a subtle Japanese accent.
personality.agenda: To share his passion for holo-projection technology and help others express themselves through it.
personality.background: Kai was born into a family of traditional artisans in Neo-Tokyo. He learned the art of woodworking from his father, but always felt drawn to more modern forms of expression. After discovering holo-projection, he dedicated himself to mastering its intricacies.

flavor.rationale: Kai sells handcrafted holo-projector accessories and modifications at a small stall in the market district, catering to both professionals and hobbyists.
